snippet: A man who said he had backed out of a plan to blow up airplanes testified by video from Britain about Al Qaeda during the trial of Sulaiman Abu Ghaith in Manhattan.
abstract: Saajid Badat testifies by video from Great Britain about Al Qaeda during terrorism trial of Sulaiman Abu Ghaith in Manhattan; Badat has said he had backed out of bombing plot and that testifies he never met Abu Ghaith, but his testimony seems intended to give jury an inside look at Ghaith's plan, as well as Qaeda guesthouses and training camps.
lead_paragraph: A man who said he had backed out of a plan to blow up airplanes testified by video from Britain about Al Qaeda during the trial of Sulaiman Abu Ghaith in Manhattan.

headline.main: Shoe-Bomb Plot Revisited at Trial of Bin Laden Relative
headline.print_headline: Shoe-Bomb Plot Revisited at Trial of Bin Laden Relative
